(row = 19, col = 1)

The avatar is currently at (19, 1) and hasn't moved from the last position. In this state, the next most logical action would be to check for any safe directions to move since I have just performed no action that changes the position. 

Looking at the adjacent squares from my current position (19, 1), we have:
- (19, 0): 'w' (wall)
- (19, 2): '&' (gold)
- (18, 1): '.' (free space)
- (20, 1): 'w' (wall)

The best opportunity is to move right into (19, 2), collecting the gold, which serves as a good resource. Thus we can proceed as follows:

``` Action:2 ``` 

I expect this action to be beneficial as it allows for the collection of gold while staying safe from any hazards.
